page.title: 10A SEASIDE VISIT
page.content: Sometimes on a Sunday our family goes to the beach.First we relax on the sand and maybe go in for a swim in the sea. At lunch we probably eat a picnic on the beach.The children would make sandcastles with buckets and spades and they might even dig a great big hole and bury themselves in the hole. They might make sand slides to slide down. They might go on the games like the bouncing castle, trampolines, swingboats,a big water slide and lots of other things. Then after a lovely day at the beach they would go and look for a Take Away and have for tea. Most people in our family prefer fish and chips.
